explains: n. 圆柱，纪念柱；柱状物；纵队，纵行（列）；（报纸、杂志上的）栏；（报纸或杂志的）专栏（文章）
wordGroup: column chromatography 柱层析法；柱色谱法
packed column 填充塔；填充蒸馏塔
concrete column 混凝土柱，水泥柱
single column 单柱的；单行索引
reinforced concrete column 钢筋混凝土柱
resin column 尸柱；离子交换柱

sentences.en: I always read her column in the local paper.
sentences.cn: 我一直读她在当地报纸上的专栏文章。

sentences.en: His column is syndicated throughout the world.
sentences.cn: 他的专栏文章在世界各地的报刊发表。

sentences.en: This column displays the title of the mail message.
